data.title: Jo STAFFORD & Gordon MacRAE
data.meta_description: Jo Stafford and Gordon MacRae were two of America’s best loved singers to emerge from the 1940s. They were teamed in the recording studio for more than two years and their recordings as a duet sold millions. data.text:
Jo Stafford and Gordon MacRae were two of America's best loved singers to emerge from the 1940s. They were teamed in the recording studio for more than two years and their recordings as a duet sold millions.

Major hits include: 'Whispering Hope', 'My Darling, My Darling', 'I'll String Along With You', 'Beyond the Sunset' and 'Bluebird of Happiness'.

Along with their many single releases this outstanding collection contains their reverent 'Songs of Christmas' collection and their complete 'Kiss Me Kate' album.

Wonderfully remastered their rich vocal blend continues to exude the warmth it did more than sixty years ago.

See also JASBOX 22-4, JASCD 431, JASCD 453, JASCD 723, and JASMCD 2544.
